title: Explosive New Hidden Camera Video Emerges # 1008 (Ep 1008)
description:
In this episode I address the explosive new Project Veritas video about big tech tyranny. I also discuss the best one minute video about the dangers of socialism that I’ve ever seen. I discuss a troubling connection with a key Russian figure and the collusion hoax. Finally, I discuss this liberal congresswoman’s big trouble ahead. News Picks:Explosive new revelations about big tech’s efforts to hurt the Trump team. 



Cut the nonsense and fix the border crisis!



Are we headed for a recession?



One of Christopher Steele’s alleged sources for the debunked dossier is being investigated for this attack.



The most outrageous story of the day. A homeowner is being prosecuted for defending his own home.



Ilhan Omar defends AOC’s grotesque comments.



Ilhan Omar has some serious explaining to do about her marriage situation.



Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
